section.heading: Agency Relationship Disclosure Form/Dual Agency Consent Form.
section.text: In accordance with the provisions of Business Occupations and Professions Article, §17-530, Annotated Code of Maryland, model Agency Disclosure and Dual Agency Consent forms provided by the Maryland Real Estate Commission shall be used in all applicable real estate property transactions.

annotations.annotation: Business Occupations and Professions Article, §17-530, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective January 1, 1995 (21:25 Md. R. 2092); emergency status extended at 22:12 Md. R. 897
Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective December 23, 1995 (23:2 Md. R. 92); emergency status expired April 23, 1996; adopted permanently effective May 20, 1996 (23:10 Md. R. 731)
Regulation .01 amended effective June 1, 2017 (44:8 Md. R. 402)
